alert.note: Alert for Crowley (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 21 at 9:28PM MDT until June 21 at 9:45PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM MDT FOR NORTHWESTERN CROWLEY COUNTY... At 928 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 15 miles southwest of Forder, or 39 miles northwest of La Junta, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Crowley County. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
